reviews.text:
This train station is used mainly for passengers heading over towards Manchester or towards the Huddersfield direction. 

There are three platforms and each platform has a covered seating area for people to wait for their trains. 

There is car parking space nearby but there is only about 5 spaces for cars and maybe one or two disabled car spots as well. There is no where for passengers to leave their push bikes. 

The train station is also used by people who intend to walk or hike around the area, or who are visiting the nearby canal which is only a matter of feet away from the train station.
